task.title: Edit Table Columns
task.shortdesc: Add, remove, edit, or reorder columns currently visible in the Results window.

step.cmd:
Click the Edit table columns... button or choose the
ResultsEdit table columns... menu item.
step.stepresult: This will open the Edit Columns dialog, which shows the current columns of the table and their options.

step.cmd: To add a column to the table, click Add field.../+ and select a field name from the list. Alternatively, you may select Custom from the list to create a custom field.

stepresult.note: Creating a custom field may require some familiarity with Javascript.

step.cmd: To remove a column from the table, select it and click Remove selected field/- or press Delete/Backspace.
To re-order a column, select it and use the up/down arrows to move it higher or lower in the outline.
